experience.title: Dataexpress
description: Dataexpress is a No-Code Data Pipeline ELT Platform that allows you to connect your data sources and destinations in minutes.
Working on the front & backend, using Next.js, Node.js and Python.

Implemented a destination connector for Google Cloud Storage while adding validation, IAM permission testing, and feature documentation. Built a source connector for Facebook Ads using the Facebook Marketing API.

experience.title: RoBorregos

images.description: On our trip to compete at RescueMaze in Xalapa.

description: Representative Robotics Team from Tecnol√≥gico de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey.
Participated in national robotics competitions (Robocup Maze, Robocup@Home), representing ITESM.

Integrated locally runned STT (Whisper) and VAD (Silero VAD) ML models to a speech to text pipeline (ROS, Python) for an xArm 6 robot, to execute voice commands as interpreted through a Jetson Xavier.
Active member of Web development, Social Impact, Robocup@Home (HRI and Nav), and RCJ Maze mentoring teams.

experience.title: Virtual Learning Center
description: Virtual Learning Center (CVA) is a social program that promotes access to quality education through a virtual learning community offering training via courses and free educational resources.
Built a course on the American healthcare system, designed to help immigrants leverage the existing programs and resources available to them.
Designed and implemented over 60 responsive pages of content, and 4 activities using Bootstrap and JavaScript.

Implemented utility scripts to automate common tasks (i.e, compress images and eliminate dependencies efficiently). Shared the scripts to other programmers creating courses for the organization, to streamline production.

experience.title: MAE (Academic mentor of excellence)
description: MAEs is an organization that provides academic support to collegue students in a variety of subjects.
Providing academic mentoring to students in mathematics, computer science, and physics courses.
Aided in the MAE webpage redesign to enhance user experience and streamline scheduling for students.
